synopsis.text: Demon lord Satan Rchimedes, once sealed away by the legendary hero Creation, is believed to have returned when a mysterious hole connects the demon and human realms, unleashing chaos. The king, unable to identify the true descendant of Creation after a thousand years, summons 75 potential heirs, promising fortune and the title of 'true hero' to the one who defeats Satan. Among them is Alba, an unlikely hero with questionable skills, and his partner Ross, a skilled but sadistic warrior. As Alba and Ross embark on their quest to defeat the demon lord, they encounter peculiar companions and face unexpected challenges, turning their adventure into a comedic and emotional journey filled with battles, laughter, and surprising revelations.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
